remarks: Binary relation expressing ` B ` covers ` A ` , which means that ` B ` is larger than ` A ` and there is nothing in between.  Definition 3.2.18 of [PtakPulmannova] p. 68.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cvbr $p |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH ) -> ( A <oH B <-> ( A C. B /\ -. E. x e. CH ( A C. x /\ x C. B ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
